Title: Erratum to: Back to the Grindstone? The Archaeological Potential of Grinding-Stone Studies in Africa with Reference to Contemporary Grinding Practices in Marakwet, Northwest Kenya (African Archaeological Review, (2017), 34, 3, (415-435), 10.1007/s10437-017-9264-0)
Abstract: © 2017, Springer Science+Business Media, LLC.The original version of this article unfortunately contained a mistake. The nomenclature BEragrostis tei^ in the body should be BEragrostis tef.^.
